sentence.Network_en: The region was split three ways, between Greece, Serbia and Bulgaria.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一地区被希腊、塞尔维亚和保加利亚分成了3部分。

sentence.Network_en: Oil or no oil, Serbia has troubles.
sentence.Network_cn: 不管是否有石油，塞尔维亚的困难都会存在。

sentence.Network_en: Reports of torture and mass executions in Serbia's detention camps have outraged the world's religious leaders.
sentence.Network_cn: 关于塞尔维亚拘留营里动用酷刑并大肆处决的报道令全世界的宗教领袖义愤填膺。

PerfectNetExp.exp: 塞尔维亚和黑山共和国
PerfectNetExp.abs: 图文塞尔维亚和黑山共和国 (Serbia and Montenegro) 简称塞黑,面积102173平方公里,位于欧洲巴尔干半岛的中北部,濒临亚得里亚海,与波斯尼亚和黑塞哥维那、克罗地亚、匈牙利、.

meanwhile , relations between serbia and montenegro have deteriorated because serbia accuses its small neighbour of harbouring members of a drugs gang whom it wants extradited .与此同时，塞国和黑山国之间的关系已经恶化了，因为塞国指责黑山国的小邻国窝藏塞国想要引渡的毒品团伙。
